CustomField.description: Segment to be used on the Lead to determine opportunity record type to convert the lead to.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Plantyn"),"Plantyn", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Liber"),CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"University")),"Liber University", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Liber"),CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"School")),"Liber School", IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Liber"),"Liber", IF(CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_BAO"),"Noordhoff PE", IF(CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_HO_VE"),"Noordhoff HE", IF(CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_MBO"),"Noordhoff VE", IF(CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_VO"),"Noordhoff SE", IF(CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_Professional"),"Noordhoff Professional", IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c,"Noordhoff"),"Noordhoff",""))))))))))
CustomField.label: Segment
